pageContext.claim: “I said, ‘Bob Kraft, which is bigger? Which is more important to the Jewish people?’ He said, ‘Neither.’ I said, ‘What does that mean?’ He said, ‘What you did by terminating the Iran nuclear deal is bigger than both.’ I think that’s true.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeated this same story — word for word — naming three separate prominent Jewish people and claiming each of them had the same response. On this day, he named two different people in different events just hours apart.
